main: ^Oh! You're the brave soul that brought Ezra back to us. I cannot thank you enough for that.
^I just happened to come across him. Couldn't exactly leave him there once I did.
^Oh, but you could have. Plenty of folk would have, if they were in your shoes. And now you're helping us, too.
^I am trying, at least. I hope to find answers in town.
^I'm inclined to agree. The church in particular is liable to tell us more about this mess.
^I built that place, you know. Preached there for some 20 years, and they ran me out of it. Threatened to kill me if I stood my ground.
^From what I hear, those bastards have been holed up inside for some time. There are strange noises, flashes of light.
^And any folk that try and investigate just disappear.
^Cultists, ne'er-do-wells, in my house of worship! It's a disgrace!
^Apologies. All I can ask is that you see if anyone in town's still alive. I need to know.

c-0: ^ Is there anything else you can tell me?

heavyhint: ^Whatever they're doing in my church, it's evil. It will be more deadly than whatever monsters or demons you might have seen thus far. When you get there, be wary.
^Thanks for the warning. I'll be as careful as I can be.
